title: Wool in Australia
creator_credit: Films Incorporated and Institut für Film und Bild
brief_description: Describes life in the Australian outback and the living conditions of a family who raise sheep. Shows shearing, wool sorting, grading, baling and shipping to city markets for auction.
creator_credit_for_label: Films Incorporated and Institut für Film und Bild
